info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 31 at 3:17AM PST until January 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...First freeze of the Winter season with sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu City. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions could kill crops and sensitive vegetation if not protected or brought indoors.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
